org.springframework.mock.http.server.reactive.MockServerHttpRequest

  • 使用MockServerHttpRequest的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.mock.http.server.reactive
    Mock implementations of reactive HTTP server contracts.
    org.springframework.mock.web.server
    Mock implementations of Spring's reactive server web API abtsractions.

      Set the body of the request and build it.

      Set the body of the request and build it.
      MockServerHttpRequest MockServerHttpRequest.BaseBuilder.build()
      Builds the request with no body.
